docs.lead_paragraph: A measure allowing the public to decide whether the State Constitution should assert that life begins at conception will appear on next year’s ballot.

headline.seo: North Dakota Allows Vote on Strict Abortion Limit
headline.main: North Dakota to Put End to Abortions on the Ballot
headline.print_headline: North Dakota To Put End To Abortions On the Ballot

docs.abstract: North Dakota passes resolution to allow public to decide whether State Constitution should assert that life begins at conception, move that essentially ban all abortions in state; measure will appear on 2014 ballot.
docs.snippet: A measure allowing the public to decide whether the State Constitution should assert that life begins at conception will appear on next year’s ballot.

docs.lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an Op-Ed article about a New York City advertising campaign to combat teenage pregnancy.

headline.main: Does Shame Have a Place in Society?
headline.print_headline: Does Shame Have a Place in Society?
